mapper.insert: insert into comment_reactions (id, comment_id, user_id, reaction_type, created_at) values (#{reaction.id}, #{reaction.commentId}, #{reaction.userId}, #{reaction.type}, #{reaction.createdAt})
mapper.delete: delete from comment_reactions where comment_id = #{reaction.commentId} and user_id = #{reaction.userId}
mapper.select: select CR.id reactionId, CR.comment_id reactionCommentId, CR.user_id reactionUserId, CR.reaction_type reactionType, CR.created_at reactionCreatedAt from comment_reactions CR where CR.comment_id = #{commentId} and CR.user_id = #{userId}
